## `SetHistogramRounding`

Sets how data are rounded (during binning) in histograms\index{graphs!histograms}.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetHistogramRounding(Rounding method)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| [`Rounding`](#rounding) method | How to round values when sorting them into bins. |
:::
